section.heading: Penalties.

para.text: A host found to have violated § 30-201.02 or § 30-201.06 shall be liable for a civil penalty of:
$6,000 for a third violation and a revocation of the related short-term rental license endorsement.
A booking service found to have violated § 30-201.08 shall be liable for a civil penalty of $1,000 for each booking transaction made in violation of this subchapter.
The Mayor may adjust these penalties by rulemaking.
